#include<stdio.h>
#define gc getchar
inline int sscan()
{int n=0,c=gc();
while(c<'0'||c>'9')
c=gc();
while(c<='9'&&c>='0')
    {
n=n*10+c-'0';
c=gc();
    }
return n;}

int main()
{
    int val;
    val=sscan();
    if(val%2==0) {

       printf("%d is an even number.\n",val);
    }
    else {

        printf("%d is an odd number.\n",val);
    }

    return 0;
}
